description: This file defines the PackageList class, which manages the React packages used in the application.

classes.name: PackageList
classes.description: A class that contains methods to provide the list of React packages used in the application.

methods.name: PackageList(ReactNativeHost)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the PackageList with a ReactNativeHost.

methods.name: PackageList(Application)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the PackageList with an Application.

methods.name: getPackages
methods.description: Returns a list of React packages required by the application.
